definition: A structure or container typically made of wood, used to house and maintain a community of insects known for their production of honey. It is commonly found in rural areas and is utilized by beekeepers for the purpose of beekeeping and honey production.

examples.english: The beehive is in the garden.

examples.german: Die Bienen fliegen zurück zum Bienenstock.
examples.english: The bees are flying back to the beehive.
The beekeeper is opening the beehive.
The beehive is made of wood.

examples.german: Die Bienen produzieren Honig im Bienenstock.
examples.english: The bees produce honey in the beehive.
